deposit_asset(bytes32).details: MUST emit Asset_Deposited if successfulETH approve function should be run before running this

params.vega_public_key: Target vega public key to be credited with this deposit

returns._0: The assigned Vega Asset Id for ETH

params.nonce: Vega-assigned single-use number that provides replay attack protection
params.signatures: Vega-supplied signature bundle of a validator-signed order

params.nonce: Vega-assigned single-use number that provides replay attack protection
params.signatures: Vega-supplied signature bundle of a validator-signed order
params.target: Target Ethereum address to receive withdrawn ETH

deposit_asset(bytes32).notice: This function allows a user to deposit ETH into VegaETH approve function should be run before running this

get_deposit_maximum().notice: This view returns maximum valid deposit

get_deposit_minimum().notice: This view returns minimum valid deposit

set_deposit_maximum(uint256,uint256,byte.notice: This function sets the maximum allowable deposit for ETHSee MultisigControl for more about signatures

set_deposit_minimum(uint256,uint256,byte.notice: This function sets the minimum allowable deposit for ETHSee MultisigControl for more about signatures

withdraw_asset(uint256,uint256,address,u.notice: This function sets the maximum allowable deposit for the given ETHSee MultisigControl for more about signatures

userdoc.notice: Implementations of this interface are used by Vega network users to deposit and withdraw ETH to/from Vega.
